dialogs.npcText:
Oook-ook ahhha. 
 *This monkey is wearing a robe with dark swirls on it. They are fully entranced by a glow in their hands.*
dialogs.thirdText: [3] Sir, your hands are on fire.

dialogs.npcText:
Oooh Oooh Eeek Eeeeek. 
 *The monkey seems disinterested in you. Perhaps you should get his hat?*
dialogs.secondText: [2] You really want a nerd hat?

dialogs.npcText:
Eeeek eeek. 
 *The robed monkey looks happy to see you, I think he knows you have what he wants.*

Ohhh-eek. 
 *The robed monkey, armed with his new hat, has returned to observing the glow. He pays you no heed.*

Aaaaw? 
 *The robed monkey turns towards you. From here the glow is much brighter, but you can make out his nerdy face, and his ratty hat.*

Eeeeeeek! 
 *The robed monkey curls his lips up and bares his teeth. However, he makes no move against you.*
dialogs.thirdText: [3] A new hat is less nerdy.

dialogs.npcText:
Aaaaaaah-hah-ha. 
 *The monkey nods, pulling off his hat and looking at it. He pulls out a map and points to a cave.*
dialogs.thirdText: [3] So you want a cave hat?

dialogs.npcText: *The monkey grabs the hat, replacing his old one. Summoning the glow, the hat shoots up into the sky, followed by a faint boom.*
